special_text:
When Davriel, Interloper has nine or more loyalty counters on him, transform him.
[+3]: Look at the top card of each player’s library, then target player mills three cards.
[+1]: Target player discards a card.
rules_text2:
Ward–Pay X life, where X is the number of loyalty counters on Davriel, God of Thieves.
{T}, Remove X loyalty counters from Davriel, God of Thieves: Put a creature card with mana value X from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
